mapper.select: select a.* from( select ROW_NUMBER() over(order by v_date desc) as recNUM, v_date, member_id, v_gender, v_roadAddress, v_birth from visit) a where Recnum between(#{section}-1)*100+(#{pageNum}-1)*10+1 and (#{section}-1)*100+#{pageNum}*10 order by v_date desc
select count(v_date) , a from (select substr(v_roadAddress, 6, instr(v_roadAddress, ' ',1)-2) as a, v_date from visit) group by a
SELECT count(v_gender) from visit group by v_gender

SELECT a.* from( select ROW_NUMBER() over(order by v_date desc) as recNUM, v_date, member_id, v_gender, v_roadAddress, v_birth FROM visit WHERE v_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{fromDate}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND TO_DATE(#{toDate}, 'yyyy-MM-dd')+0.99999 order by v_date desc ) a where Recnum between(#{section}-1)*100+(#{pageNum}-1)*10+1 and (#{section}-1)*100+#{pageNum}*10 order by v_date desc
SELECT count(v_date) FROM visit WHERE v_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{fromDate}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND TO_DATE(#{toDate}, 'yyyy-MM-dd')+0.99999

select count(v_date) , a from (select substr(v_roadAddress, 6, instr(v_roadAddress, ' ',1)-2) as a, v_date from visit) where v_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{fromDate}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND TO_DATE(#{toDate}, 'yyyy-MM-dd')+0.99999 group by a
SELECT count(v_gender) from visit where v_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{fromDate}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND TO_DATE(#{toDate}, 'yyyy-MM-dd')+0.99999 group by v_gender
select count(*) as cnt from (select floor((to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY') - substr(v_birth, 0, 4) + 1) / 10) * 10 as y from visit) o group by y order by y
